name: task-manager
description: This repository contains a full‑stack Kanban style task manager designed to boost team productivity. It features a dark themed user interface, drag‑and‑drop task management, real‑time collaboration, authentication with role‑based access control and detailed activity logs for every task. The project is structured into two separate applications: a **Node.js/Express** backend that persists data in a lightweight **SQLite** database and a **React** frontend built with **Vite** and **Material UI**.
